mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BALANCE ( COMPANY_MGMTNO, USER_MGMTSEQ, SALE_STR_DATE, SALE_END_DATE, SALE_COMMISSION, CP_COMMISSION, OWNER_PROFIT, TOTAL_SALE_COUNT, TOTAL_SALE_PRICE, SALE_TYPE, CONTRACT_TYPE, MOD_DT, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{company_mgmtno}, #{user_mgmtseq}, #{sale_str_date}, #{sale_end_date}, #{total_sale_company_commission}, #{total_cp_commission}, #{total_profit}, #{total_sale_count}, #{total_sale_price}, #{sale_type}, #{contract_type}, NOW(), NOW() )

INSERT INTO BALANCE_DETAIL ( BALANCE_MGMTNO, CONTENTS_CD, SALE_COUNT, SALE_PRICE, CP_PROFIT, SALE_PROFIT, MOD_DT, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{balance_mgmtno}, #{contents_cd}, #{sale_count}, #{contentsSalePrice}, #{contentsCpProfit}, #{contentsSaleProfit}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT /* Balance.cpList */ COMPANY_NAME, SALE_STR_DATE, SALE_END_DATE, SUM(TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE, SUM(CP_COMMISSION) AS CP_COMMISSION, SUM(TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT, COMPANY_MGMTNO, (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = CONTRACT_TYPE) AS CONTRACT_TYPE, REG_DT FROM ( SELECT (SELECT COMPANY_NAME FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_MGMTNO = CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO) AS COMPANY_NAME , CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO , (SELECT CONTRACT_TYPE FROM CONTRACT WHERE COMPANY_MGMTNO = CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO LIMIT 1) AS CONTRACT_TYPE ,SUM(BALD.SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE ,SUM(BALD.CP_PROFIT) AS CP_COMMISSION ,SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT ,BALD.CONTENTS_CD ,BAL.REG_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_STR_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_END_DATE FROM BALANCE_DETAIL BALD, BALANCE BAL, CONTENTS CON WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = CON.CONTENTS_CD AND BAL.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY BALD.CONTENTS_CD, BAL.SALE_END_DATE ORDER BY BAL.SALE_END_DATE ) A WHERE 1=1
AND COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
AND SALE_END_DATE = #{searchDate}
GROUP BY COMPANY_MGMTNO, SALE_END_DATE
ORDER BY SALE_END_DATE DESC
ORDER BY TOTAL_SALE_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY CP_COMMISSION DESC
ORDER BY TOTAL_SALE_COUNT DESC
LIMIT #{ startRownum }, #{ perPage }

SELECT /* Balance.cpsCount */ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (SELECT COMPANY_NAME FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_MGMTNO = CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO) AS COMPANY_NAME , CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO , (SELECT CONTRACT_TYPE FROM CONTRACT WHERE COMPANY_MGMTNO = CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO LIMIT 1) AS CONTRACT_TYPE ,SUM(BALD.SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE ,SUM(BALD.CP_PROFIT) AS CP_COMMISSION ,SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT ,BALD.CONTENTS_CD ,BAL.REG_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_STR_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_END_DATE FROM BALANCE_DETAIL BALD, BALANCE BAL, CONTENTS CON WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = CON.CONTENTS_CD AND BAL.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY BALD.CONTENTS_CD, BAL.SALE_END_DATE ORDER BY BAL.SALE_END_DATE ) A WHERE 1=1
AND COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
AND SALE_END_DATE = #{searchDate}
GROUP BY COMPANY_MGMTNO, SALE_END_DATE ) B

SELECT /* Balance.saleList */ (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.SALE_TYPE) AS SALE_TYPE, (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.CONTRACT_TYPE) AS CONTRACT_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_STR_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_END_DATE, BAL.SALE_COMMISSION as SALE_COMMISSION, BAL.CP_COMMISSION AS CP_COMMISSION, BAL.OWNER_PROFIT AS OWNER_PROFIT, BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT, BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE, COM.COMPANY_NAME, if(count(BD.CONTENTS_CD) > 1, (CONCAT(CONT.NAME, ' 외 ', count(CONT.NAME)-1)), CONT.NAME) AS contents_name FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM, BALANCE_DETAIL BD, CONTENTS CONT WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND CONT.CONTENTS_CD = BD.CONTENTS_CD AND BAL.DEL_YN = 'N' AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'SC'
AND ( COM.COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%' OR CONT.NAME like '%${searchQuery}%' )
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{searchDate}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m'), BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO
ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') DESC
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY BAL.OWNER_PROFIT DESC
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT DESC
LIMIT #{ startRownum }, #{ perPage }

SELECT /* Balance.saleCompanyList */ COM.COMPANY_NAME as company_name, COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO as company_mgmtno FROM COMPANY COM, CONTRACT CONT WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CONT.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'SC'

SELECT /* Balance.device */ CTD.SALE_TYPE as sale_type, (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = CTD.SALE_TYPE) AS sale_type_name FROM COMPANY COM, CONTRACT CONT, CONTRACT_DETAIL CTD WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CONT.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND CONT.CONTRACT_MGMTNO = CTD.CONTRACT_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'SC' AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = #{company_mgmtno} GROUP BY CTD.SALE_TYPE

SELECT /* Balance.saleType */ CONT.CONTRACT_TYPE as contract_type, (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = CONT.CONTRACT_TYPE) AS contract_type_name FROM COMPANY COM, CONTRACT CONT WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CONT.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'SC' AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = #{company_mgmtno} GROUP BY CONT.CONTRACT_TYPE

SELECT CCGR.CONTENTS_CD as contents_cd, CON.NAME as name, CCGR.SALE_PRICE as sale_price, ( SELECT SALE_PROFIT_RATE FROM CONTRACT WHERE COMPANY_MGMTNO=CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO LIMIT 1 ) AS cp_rate, CNTR.SALE_PROFIT_RATE AS sale_company_rate, (SELECT COMPANY_NAME FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_MGMTNO = CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO) AS cp_name
FROM COMPANY COM, CONTRACT CNTR, CONTENTS CON, CONTRACT_CONTENTS_GROUP CCGR WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR.CONTRACT_MGMTNO = CCGR.CONTRACT_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CNTR.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND CON.CONTENTS_CD = CCGR.CONTENTS_CD AND CNTR.COMPANY_MGMTNO = #{company_mgmtno} AND CNTR.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CON.NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
GROUP BY CCGR.CONTENTS_CD
mapper.update: UPDATE BALANCE SET SALE_STR_DATE = #{sale_str_date}, SALE_END_DATE= #{sale_end_date}, SALE_COMMISSION= #{sale_commission}, CP_COMMISSION= #{cp_commission}, OWNER_PROFIT= #{owner_profit}, TOTAL_SALE_COUNT= #{total_sale_count}, TOTAL_SALE_PRICE= #{total_sale_price}, MOD_DT= NOW() WHERE BALANCE_MGMTNO = #{balance_mgmtno}
UPDATE BALANCE SET DEL_YN = 'Y', MOD_DT= NOW() WHERE BALANCE_MGMTNO = #{balance_mgmtno}
